abstract: After a year of staggering losses, Toyota seeks to reassert its green credentials against Honda by introducing its third-generation hybrid.
snippet: After a year of staggering losses, Toyota seeks to reassert its green credentials against Honda by introducing its third-generation hybrid.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO  Toyota Motor began selling its next-generation Prius hybrid in Japan on Monday as it seeks to reassert its clout in an increasingly crowded market for green cars.

headline.main: Toyota, Challenging Honda, Offers Its New Prius in Japan
headline.print_headline: Toyota, Challenging Honda, Offers Its New Prius in Japan
